description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事人物，中国人民解放军少将，曾任云南省军区司令员。
description.en: A military figure of the People's Republic of China, holding the rank of Major General in the People's Liberation Army. He formerly served as the commander of the Yunnan Military District.

en: Major General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一种军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任人力资源和社会保障部部长，是张肖南的弟弟。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former Minister of Human Resources and Social Security, and the younger brother of Zhang Xiaonan.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部
人力资源和社会保障部
en: Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security of the People's Republic of China
Member of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的成员身份。
description.en: Membership status of the Communist Party of China.
Zhang Xiaonan is from Jiexi, Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 张肖南拥有中国人民解放军少将军衔。
description.en: Zhang Xiaonan holds the rank of Major General in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 张肖南曾担任云南省军区司令员。
description.en: Zhang Xiaonan formerly served as the commander of the Yunnan Military District.

description.zh-cn: 张肖南是张纪南的兄长。
description.en: Zhang Xiaonan is the elder brother of Zhang Jinan.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部

description.zh-cn: 张纪南是中华人民共和国人力资源和社会保障部原部长。
description.en: Zhang Jinan is the former Minister of Human Resources and Social Security of the People's Republic of China.
